txt.en: 'Keeping black powder out of Ordâkhai hands is important for our survival. Thank you.'
Talk to the Dumûri scout on the walkway leaving Eshadûr
You have completed your mission and should talk to the Dumûri scout.
'Thank you for your help, [placeholder]! Black powder is a dangerous weapon, and we should do what we can to keep it out of Ordâkhai hands.'
Search Eshadûr for explosive black powder, and destroy any containers of the substance you find.
The Dumûri have learned the Ordâkhai in Eshadûr have restocked their supply of black powder.
